containsControlledChanges
Method.Source:
/// <summary> /// Checks whether the data entity is trying to make changes on fields which are change-controlled. /// </summary> /// <returns>True if such changes are being made; false otherwise.</returns> protected boolean containsControlledChanges() { boolean result = (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::Name) && this.VendorName != this.orig().VendorName)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::BankAccount) && this.BankAccountId != this.orig().BankAccountId)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::CashDisc) && this.CashDiscountCode != this.orig().CashDiscountCode)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::CreditMax) && this.CreditLimit != this.orig().CreditLimit)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::CreditRating) && this.CreditRating != this.orig().CreditRating)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::InvoiceAccount) && this.InvoiceVendorAccountNumber != this.orig().InvoiceVendorAccountNumber)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::PaymMode) && this.DefaultVendorPaymentMethodName != this.orig().DefaultVendorPaymentMethodName)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::PaymSpec) && this.PaymentSpecificationId != this.orig().PaymentSpecificationId)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::PaymTermId) && this.DefaultPaymentTermsName != this.orig().DefaultPaymentTermsName)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::VATNum) && this.TaxExemptNumber != this.orig().TaxExemptNumber)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::VendGroup) && this.VendorGroupId != this.orig().VendorGroupId)
|| (VendTableChangeProposalFieldEnablement::isEnabledFor(VendTableChangeProposalField::VendPriceToleranceGroupId) && this.VendorPriceToleranceGroupId != this.orig().VendorPriceToleranceGroupId);
return result; }
